	Solid background in responsive and adaptive design
	Familiarity with CI/CD practices

	Effective communication and teamwork skills
	Fluent in English (C1)
	Experience working in a Scrum environment

Senior ReactJS Developer Job at ResumeSurge




        
    

        
        ResumeSurge - Our client, Eryk Group, is an international technical service provider specializing in the delivering of electrical and mechanical installations, engineering, and commissioning and IT services for a wide range of industries. With a strong presence across Europe and beyond, Eryk is known for its expertise, quality, and flexibility in adapting to diverse project requirements worldwide.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior ReactJS Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client is seeking a highly skilled Senior ReactJS Developer with strong expertise in modern frontend engineering to join our dynamic team.
	As a senior member of the development group, you will play a key role in architecting, building, and maintaining high-quality, user-centric web applications.


Working Structure:


	This is a hybrid role (2 days onsite, 3 days remote), but the first two months will be fully on-site at our premises in Gbagada, Lagos. The position requires a standard 40-hour work week, with 8 hours per day.


Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain complex web applications using the React framework.
	Write clean, efficient, and well-structured code that adheres to best practices.
	Collaborate with backend developers, UX designers, and product managers to deliver exceptional user experiences.
	Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues to ensure optimal application performance.
	Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix bugs.
	Stay updated with the latest web development trends and technologies.
	Lead code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
	Mentor junior developers and support the overall technical growth of the team.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree
	At least 6 years of experience as a Frontend Developer with strong ReactJS focus
	Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and CSS
	Strong understanding of the React framework and its core concepts
	Experience with modern web application architecture
	Solid background in responsive and adaptive design
	Familiarity with CI/CD practices
	Proficiency with Git
	Effective communication and teamwork skills
	Fluent in English (C1)
	Experience working in a Scrum environment


Salary
N1,200,000 - N1,500,000 / Month.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative (Female)",
  "description": "Hec Recruit is a full-service HR consulting firm with a unique approach. Since 2020 we have been helping our clients find a job best suited for their skills and interests, and helping local companies locate the best employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative (Female)
Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As a Customer Service Representative, you will be the primary point of contact for our customers, providing timely and effective solutions to their queries and concerns.
	You will work closely with our team to ensure seamless customer experience and build strong relationships with our clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat
	Resolve customer complaints and issues in a timely and professional manner
	Provide accurate information about our products/services
	Build strong relationships with customers to ensure loyalty and retention
	Collaborate with internal teams to resolve customer issues
	Document customer interactions and feedback
	Meet or exceed customer satisfaction targets

Job Summary

	We’re looking for a skilled and creative YouTube/Podcast Video Editor to bring our content to life. You’ll be responsible for crafting high-quality episodes that engage, inform, and resonate with audiences.
	From refining audio and visuals to adding music, effects, and social clips, your editing will define the look, feel, and energy of our shows.


Key Responsibilities


	Edit and enhance podcast and video episodes for clarity, flow, and audience engagement.
	Clean up audio, remove background noise, and balance sound levels for professional-quality output.
	Add intros, outros, sound effects, and background music to elevate the listener/viewer experience.
	Collaborate with hosts and producers to maintain tone, pacing, and storytelling direction.
	Create social media clips and short-form content from full episodes.
	Optimize content for platforms like YouTube, Spotify, and Apple Podcasts.
	Stay current with podcast/video trends and apply best practices for growth and engagement.
	Manage and organize media assets and episode archives efficiently.
	Ensure every episode aligns with brand standards and creative vision.


Requirements


	BSc, HND, or equivalent qualification in a related field.
	Proven experience editing podcasts or video content.
	Proficiency in tools like Adobe Audition, Pro Tools, Audacity, Descript, or Premiere Pro.
	Strong grasp of sound design, pacing, and visual storytelling.
	Meticulous attention to detail and sound quality.
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
	Ability to meet tight deadlines and manage multiple projects at once.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Portfolio showcasing previous podcast or YouTube editing work.
	Experience across multiple formats (interviews, panels, solo episodes, etc.).
	Familiarity with optimizing content for YouTube and social platforms.
	Understanding of copyright-safe music, SFX, and licensing.

	Salary: N250,000 monthly

	Fully remote,work from anywhere
